articles.title: It's Finally Easy to Find and Save Photos From Messages in iOS 15

articles.title: Strava makes its location sharing safety feature free
articles.description: Social fitness network Strava has made one of its most useful safety features available to all users. Starting today, anyone — not just those with a subscription — can use the app’s Beacon feature to share their location with friends and family members.To ena…
